segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 4
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 4

segments.pli: 24. Kammavagga
segments.en: 24. Deeds

segments.pli: 233. Vitthārasutta
segments.en: 233. Deeds in Detail

segments.pli: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, kammāni mayā sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditāni.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I declare these four kinds of deeds, having realized them with my own insight.

segments.pli: Katamāni cattāri?
segments.en: What four?

segments.pli: Atthi, bhikkhave, kammaṃ kaṇhaṃ kaṇhavipākaṃ;
segments.en: There are dark deeds with dark results;

segments.pli: atthi, bhikkhave, kammaṃ sukkaṃ sukkavipākaṃ;
segments.en: bright deeds with bright results;

segments.pli: atthi, bhikkhave, kammaṃ kaṇhasukkaṃ kaṇhasukkavipākaṃ;
segments.en: dark and bright deeds with dark and bright results; and

segments.pli: atthi, bhikkhave, kammaṃ akaṇhaasukkaṃ akaṇhaasukkavipākaṃ kammakkhayāya saṃvattati.
segments.en: neither dark nor bright deeds with neither dark nor bright results, which lead to the ending of deeds.

segments.pli: Katamañca, bhikkhave, kammaṃ kaṇhaṃ kaṇhavipākaṃ?
segments.en: And what are dark deeds with dark results?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sabyābajjhaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti, sabyābajjhaṃ vacīsaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti, sabyābajjhaṃ manosaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti.
segments.en: It’s when someone makes hurtful choices by way of body, speech, and mind.

segments.pli: So sabyābajjhaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharitvā, sabyābajjhaṃ vacīsaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharitvā, sabyābajjhaṃ manosaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharitvā sabyābajjhaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
segments.en: Having made these choices, they’re reborn in a hurtful world,

segments.pli: Tamenaṃ sabyābajjhaṃ lokaṃ upapannaṃ samānaṃ sabyābajjhā phassā phusanti.
segments.en: where hurtful contacts touch them.

segments.pli: So sabyābajjhehi phassehi phuṭṭho samāno sabyābajjhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyati ekantadukkhaṃ, seyyathāpi sattā nerayikā.
segments.en: Touched by hurtful contacts, they experience hurtful feelings that are exclusively painful—like the beings in hell.

segments.pli: Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, kammaṃ kaṇhaṃ kaṇhavipākaṃ.
segments.en: These are called dark deeds with dark results.

segments.pli: Katamañca, bhikkhave, kammaṃ sukkaṃ sukkavipākaṃ?
segments.en: And what are bright deeds with bright results?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco abyābajjhaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti, abyābajjhaṃ vacīsaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti, abyābajjhaṃ manosaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti.
segments.en: It’s when someone makes pleasing choices by way of body, speech, and mind.

segments.pli: So abyābajjhaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharitvā, abyābajjhaṃ vacīsaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharitvā, abyābajjhaṃ manosaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharitvā abyābajjhaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
segments.en: Having made these choices, they’re reborn in a pleasing world,

segments.pli: Tamenaṃ abyābajjhaṃ lokaṃ upapannaṃ samānaṃ abyābajjhā phassā phusanti.
segments.en: where pleasing contacts touch them.

segments.pli: So abyābajjhehi phassehi phuṭṭho samāno abyābajjhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyati ekantasukhaṃ, seyyathāpi devā subhakiṇhā.
segments.en: Touched by pleasing contacts, they experience pleasing feelings that are exclusively happy—like the gods replete with glory.

segments.pli: Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, kammaṃ sukkaṃ sukkavipākaṃ.
segments.en: These are called bright deeds with bright results.

segments.pli: Katamañca, bhikkhave, kammaṃ kaṇhasukkaṃ kaṇhasukkavipākaṃ?
segments.en: And what are dark and bright deeds with dark and bright results?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi kāyasaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti, sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi vacīsaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti, sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi manosaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti.
segments.en: It’s when someone makes both hurtful and pleasing choices by way of body, speech, and mind.

segments.pli: So sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi kāyasaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharitvā, sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi vacīsaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharitvā, sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi manosaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharitvā sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi lokaṃ upapajjati.
segments.en: Having made these choices, they are reborn in a world that is both hurtful and pleasing,

segments.pli: Tamenaṃ sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi lokaṃ upapannaṃ samānaṃ sabyābajjhāpi abyābajjhāpi phassā phusanti.
segments.en: where hurtful and pleasing contacts touch them.

segments.pli: So sabyābajjhehipi abyābajjhehipi phassehi phuṭṭho samāno sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi vedanaṃ vediyati vokiṇṇasukhadukkhaṃ, seyyathāpi manussā ekacce ca devā ekacce ca vinipātikā.
segments.en: Touched by both hurtful and pleasing contacts, they experience both hurtful and pleasing feelings that are a mixture of pleasure and pain—like humans, some gods, and some beings in the underworld.

segments.pli: Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, kammaṃ kaṇhasukkaṃ kaṇhasukkavipākaṃ.
segments.en: These are called dark and bright deeds with dark and bright results.

segments.pli: Katamañca, bhikkhave, kammaṃ akaṇhaasukkaṃ akaṇhaasukkavipākaṃ kammakkhayāya saṃvattati?
segments.en: And what are neither dark nor bright deeds with neither dark nor bright results, which lead to the ending of deeds?

segments.pli: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidaṃ kammaṃ kaṇhaṃ kaṇhavipākaṃ tassa pahānāya yā cetanā, yamidaṃ kammaṃ sukkaṃ sukkavipākaṃ tassa pahānāya yā cetanā, yamidaṃ kammaṃ kaṇhasukkaṃ kaṇhasukkavipākaṃ tassa pahānāya yā cetanā—
segments.en: It’s the intention to give up dark deeds with dark results, bright deeds with bright results, and both dark and bright deeds with both dark and bright results.

segments.pli: idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, kammaṃ akaṇhaasukkaṃ akaṇhaasukkavipākaṃ kammakkhayāya saṃvattati.
segments.en: These are called neither dark nor bright deeds with neither dark nor bright results, which lead to the ending of deeds.

segments.pli: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri kammāni mayā sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditānī”ti.
segments.en: These are the four kinds of deeds that I declare, having realized them with my own insight.”

segments.pli: Dutiyaṃ.

suttaplex.blurb: Karma that’s dark, bright, both, and neither.
